allow: Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "INSERT INTO cidades (nomeCidade, idCidade, uf) VALUES (''Salvador'', ''2927408'', ''BA''), (''Sao Paulo'', ''3550308'', ''SP''), (''Rio de Janeiro'', ''3304557'', ''RJ''), (''Brasilia'', ''5300108'', ''DF''), (''Fortaleza'', ''2304400'', ''CE''), (''Belo Horizonte'', ''3106200'', ''MG''), (''Recife'', ''2611606'', ''PE''), (''Porto Alegre'', ''4314902'', ''RS''), (''Curitiba'', ''4106902'', ''PR''), (''Manaus'', ''1302603'', ''AM'');")

Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "INSERT INTO veiculos (numero, placa, motorista, modelo, dataCompra, qtdPoltronas) VALUES (''V001'', ''ABC1234'', ''Jose da Silva'', ''Mercedes-Benz O500'', ''2020-01-15'', 46), (''V002'', ''DEF5678'', ''Maria Santos'', ''Volvo B270F'', ''2020-03-20'', 42), (''V003'', ''GHI9012'', ''Carlos Oliveira'', ''Scania K360'', ''2021-05-10'', 44), (''V004'', ''JKL3456'', ''Ana Paula'', ''Marcopolo G7'', ''2021-07-22'', 40), (''V005'', ''MNO7890'', ''Pedro Costa'', ''Comil Campione'', ''2022-02-14'', 48), (''V006'', ''PQR1234'', ''Lucia Ferreira'', ''Busscar Vissta'', ''2022-04-18'', 46), (''V007'', ''STU5678'', ''Roberto Alves'', ''Irizar i6'', ''2023-01-10'', 50), (''V008'', ''VWX9012'', ''Fernanda Lima'', ''Mercedes-Benz OF'', ''2023-03-25'', 42), (''V009'', ''YZA3456'', ''Ricardo Sousa'', ''Volvo 9700'', ''2023-06-30'', 44), (''V010'', ''BCD7890'', ''Patricia Rocha'', ''Scania Touring'', ''2023-09-15'', 46);")

Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_cidades FROM cidades; SELECT COUNT(*) as total_veiculos FROM veiculos; SELECT COUNT(*) as total_passagens FROM passagens;")
Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "SELECT id, nomeCidade, uf FROM cidades ORDER BY id;")
Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "SELECT id, numero, placa, motorista, modelo FROM veiculos ORDER BY id;")

Bash(docker exec mysql-container mysql -uroot -prootmoluck passagens_rodoviarias -e "SELECT p.idPassagem, v.numero as veiculo, p.poltrona, DATE_FORMAT(p.dataSaida, ''%d/%m/%Y'') as data, p.horaSaida, co.nomeCidade as origem, cd.nomeCidade as destino, p.valorPassagem, IF(p.vendida, ''Sim'', ''Nao'') as vendida FROM passagens p JOIN veiculos v ON p.veiculo_id = v.id JOIN cidades co ON p.cidadeOrigem_id = co.id JOIN cidades cd ON p.cidadeDestino_id = cd.id ORDER BY p.idPassagem;")
